name: window.lf (engineer edition)
description: A window for jjjjjjjjjjohn into code from the 60s, 70s, and 80s made with the LOGO programming language (1967) on an IBM XT using IBM LOGO.EXE (1983). This is the “engineer” edition (a.k.a. The “I forgot how slow computers used to be” edition) which is the full 5 minute original director’s cut. You’ll only enjoy this if you’re into code history and have a lot of patience. See objkt #84380 and #84364 for time compressed versions.
